title: Aircraft and aircraft equipment in the navy and Marine corps. : Hearings before the Committee on naval affairs, United States Senate, Sixty-ninth Congress, first session on H.R. 9690, an act to authorize the construction and procurement of aircraft and aircraft equipment in the navy and Marine corps, and to adjust and define the status of the operating personnel in connection therewith. April 15 and 16, 1926
author: United States. Congress. Senate. Committee on Naval Affairs.

title: A hearing on the bill (H.R. 7375) to further increase aviation in the Navy by the replacement of the U.S.S. "Shenandoah."
author: United States. Congress. House. Committee on Naval Affairs.
